card_text: 1 Tuner + 3 non-Tuner monsters$NYour opponent cannot target "Flower Cardian" monsters you control with card effects, also those monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects. During your opponent's Draw Phase, if they draw a card(s) for their normal draw: Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Skip the Draw Phase of your next turn.$N●Negate this card's other effects until your opponent's next Standby Phase.
